title: Lol client stopped working
body: Since 6.19 dropped my client has just decided it's done enough and has ceased to work. Anyone else having this problem? Any solutions or do I have to repair my entire client.

replies.body: I'd like to help but need more details.  What do you mean by cease to work?  Are you getting any error messages?  Where and when is this happening?  Let me know!

It randomly just closes, a small screen pops up and tells me the lolclient has stopped working and it closes the program. No error messages it kind of just happens randomly. Nothing really extravagant to report
